SELECT bes.`status`, bes.id sumId, a.extract_code 'code', byp.period yearPeriod, concat( substr( bes.extractmonth, 5, 2 )+ 0, '月' ) monthPeriod, bes.extractmonth extractBatch, bes.deptname unitName, a.create_time createTime, a.task_type taskType,a.payMoney FROM ( SELECT beat.extract_code, beat.relation_extract_code, beat.task_type, beat.create_time,( SELECT sum( pay_money ) FROM budget_extract_per_pay_detail WHERE extract_code = beat.extract_code AND pay_status = beat.task_type ) payMoney FROM budget_extract_account_task beat LEFT JOIN budget_billing_unit bbu ON beat.billing_unit_id = bbu.id WHERE bbu.accountants LIKE concat('%',#{params.empNo},'%') AND beat.is_should_account = 1 AND beat.accountant_status = 0
and bbu.`name` like concat('%',#{params.billingUnitName},'%')
GROUP BY beat.extract_code, beat.task_type, beat.create_time, beat.relation_extract_code ) a LEFT JOIN budget_extractsum bes ON ifnull(a.relation_extract_code,a.extract_code) = bes.`code` LEFT JOIN budget_year_period byp ON byp.id = bes.yearid
1 = 1
and a.extract_code like concat('%',#{params.orderNo},'%')
and bes.extractmonth like concat('%',#{params.extractBatch},'%')
and bes.deptname like concat('%',#{params.deptName},'%')
order by a.create_time desc,a.extract_code desc
